activities: Porzio Life Sciences, LLC (“PLS”) is dedicated to helping pharmaceutical and medical device manufactures, wholesale distributors, labelers, and sales support companies understand the regulatory environment that impacts their business, and it provides services and resources to companies in the life sciences industry to help them stay compliant with governing law.  PLS anticipates receiving and collecting personal information from individuals in the European Union (“EU”) and Switzerland.  PLS has established a comprehensive privacy program that has been designed to and is intended to protect your data privacy rights.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
